title: Macy's Inc.
description: Macy's Inc. is a prominent retail brand known for its iconic color palette. The primary color for the brand is a bold red, represented by the hex code E11A2B. This dynamic color is utilized in various marketing materials and is reflective of Macy's energetic and vibrant brand identity. The brand colors and guidelines can be found in detail from their official resources, such as the document available at https://hr.macys.net/csw/u/draft/pdfs/961.pdf.
